Référence de MediPy¶

Liste des modules :

  • 1. medipy.base — Basic data structures and functions
    • 1.1. medipy.base.array — Array-related functions
    • 1.2. medipy.base.coordinate_system — Definition and transformation of coordinate systems
  • 2. medipy.io — Reading and writing data
    • 2.1. medipy.io.dicom — Basic and file functionalities of DICOM
      • 2.1.1. medipy.io.dicom.dictionary — DICOM dictionaries
      • 2.1.2. medipy.io.dicom.encapsulated_document — Storage of non-DICOM data in DICOM data sets
      • 2.1.3. medipy.io.dicom.routing — Rule-based modification and storage of data sets
    • 2.2. medipy.io.schemes
      • 2.2.1. medipy.io.schemes.dicom
      • 2.2.2. medipy.io.schemes.dicomdir
      • 2.2.3. medipy.io.schemes.dicom_series
      • 2.2.4. medipy.io.schemes.file
  • 3. medipy.itk — Bridge between ITK and MediPy
    • 3.1. medipy.itk.types — Type conversions between ITK and MediPy
  • 4. medipy.network.dicom — Network functionalities in DICOM
    • 4.1. medipy.network.dicom.query — High-level queries
    • 4.2. medipy.network.dicom.scu — Service Class User objects
    • 4.3. medipy.network.dicom.wado — Web Access to DICOM Objects
  • 5. medipy.vtk — Bridge between VTK and MediPy
